welcome_message_body: Welcome to Peoria, where the charm of the Illinois River and our vibrant arts scene awaits you. Explore our historic downtown, enjoy our local cuisine, and soak in the beauty of our riverfront. We're thrilled to have you here!

restaurants.name: Wild Horse West
restaurants.description: Wild Horse West is a burger joint located in Peoria.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Greater Peoria Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Greater Peoria Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
